attributes.action: Stop Elegal and Conflickting Cultures / Immigrants Coming to England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I dont want nor expect Immigrants to stop coming to England, BUT we should NOT take criminals/vagrants or any kind of ELEGAL! we should have more control! (A VOTE) This is a Christian cultured Country, and nor should we take any other culture which conflicks with ours! this sounds racist but its for the best interests of our country. there are too many people here now, this is why there are so many problems, reduce the population and you reduce the problems.
